componentInstanceProperties.name: IntroText
componentInstanceProperties.value: Reinventing Hydration for GenZ and Millennials

componentInstanceProperties.name: summaryText
componentInstanceProperties.value: Open to Everyone! Be first in line to access this exclusive deal

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Back Australia’s Fastest Growing Hydration Supplements Brand


After launching 11 products in 2500+ Coles, Woolworths and Coles Express stores in the last 12 months, Vitadrop is expanding globally into the $2 trillion wellness market. Hydration and nutrient deficiencies are affecting over 80% of Australians. Vitadrop is addressing this with innovative, vitamin-infused hydration solutions, programmes and devices. Founded by a scientist and ex-athlete, and with new partnerships with entrepreneur Gretta Van Riel, Vitadrop is on a sharp growth curve with 340% year-on-year revenue growth and forecasting AUD$50M revenue in 6 years.

Problem
82% of Australians are not adequately hydrated and 80% are not receiving key micronutrients due to poor diet, both of which leads to chronic mental and physical health conditions. Vitadrop's brand has captured the shift in consumer preferences of Gen-Z and Millennials who represent 36% of retail expenditure, but are heavily underrepresented in vitamin and dietary supplement sales. Vitadrop aims to seize this major market opportunity to target younger consumers overlooked by slow-moving, incumbent brands.

Solution
Vitadrop is changing the way Australians hydrate through products, gamification and devices to "ritualise" hydration and build healthy habits. Vitadrop has developed 11 science-backed products, 4 of which have already been listed with the Therapeutics Goods Administration. Moreover, Vitadrop is developing programmes and tech-enabled hydration devices in partnership with Drop Bottle and Gretta Van Reil. Vitadrop distributes products via major retailers like Coles, Woolworths and Coles Express, and maintains a strong digital and e-commerce to continue building out customer loyalty & value.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Company Highlights

  • 11 science backed products and 4 of which have already been listed with the Therapeutics Goods Administration and FDA.
  • Secured placement in 2500 major retail stores including Coles, Woolworths and Coles Express within 18 months.
  • 340% year-on-year revenue growth and projected to reach $50 million within six years.
  • Acclaimed entrepreneurs Gretta Van Reil and Dr. Zac Turner have joined the team to drive global expansion.
  • New 1.1million follower network to monetise globally: Across Drop Bottle, Vitadrop, Detox.
  • Positioned to capitalise on the A$2 trillion global health and wellness market, projected to grow at a 7.7% CAGR (2021-2026).
  • Inbound interest for distribution into Hong Kong, New Zealand and the Middle east.
  • Manufacturing and distribution locked in across Australia and global expansion plans ready to go.
  • Opportunity in multi billion dollar pharmacy channel with interest from Terry White Pharmacies and Priceline.
  • Highly engaged Genz and Millennial community - a segment underrepresented in traditional retail sales.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue

componentInstanceProperties.value: Register your Interest

componentInstanceProperties.name: firstImgFooterText
componentInstanceProperties.value: Vitadrop targets the wellness industry, with a focus on the $66bn global and $3.2bn Australian vitamin and dietary supplement markets, part of a broader $2 trillion wellness sector growing at a 7.7% CAGR (2021-2026).

componentInstanceProperties.name: secondImgFooterText
componentInstanceProperties.value: In just 12 months, Vitadrop gained a significant retail presence, featuring 11 products in over 2,500 stores including Coles and Woolworths, and achieved a remarkable 340% growth in revenue year-on-year. They are now on track to hit $50 million in revenue in the next six years. This rapid success not only highlights the team's effective execution and the market's positive response but also opens doors for global expansion opportunities for the brand.

componentInstanceProperties.name: thirdImgFooterText
componentInstanceProperties.value: Vitadrop is 100% Australian-made and owned with 4 TGA-listed supplements. All products are proprietary and designed by former scientist Charles Wood and professional athlete turned creative director Daniel Concannon. Joining forces with Gretta Van Riel, a 5x multi-million dollar entrepreneur and recent Hydralyte board member, will help catapult the brand onto the global stage.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Advisors, ambassadors, and key investors

Jessica Mare Gourdon
Retail Advisor
Retail & FMCG expert. Specialises in strategy, buying, sales, & brand management.

Chris Lawrence
Investor
Retired Professional Rugby League player for the Wests Tigers. Current Managing Director of One Wellbeing & One Training.

What So Not
Investor
Australian DJ and producer, surpassing one billion global streams and recognised for headlining tours and major festivals across the globe.

Grant Robson
CFO
Dynamic Accountant & Finance leader with a decade of diverse experience in online businesses (Start-ups, PE Funded & ASX Listed) across Australia, US, and Europe.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The Offer

Target raise amount
$750,000 - $1,500,000


Planned use of funds
Vitadrop is at a crucial stage in its evolution, gearing up to establish itself as a leader in the hydration space for Millennials and Gen Z. The brand is poised to become a familiar presence for its core audience. To support this growth, investment will focus on precision marketing, enhancing operational efficiency, and attracting industry-leading talent to maintain the brand's upward trajectory.

Working capital $350K

Marketing $400k- $1m

People 0- 150k

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Questions? Read our Frequently Asked Questions, Investor Hub or reach out to Charles Wood: charles@vitadrop.co

This investment opportunity is open to every 18+ Australian resident, and you can invest from just $250.
